title: Database Backup Failure
description: Automated backup system failed for 3 consecutive nights due to storage capacity issues. Issue only discovered during routine audit, raising concerns about monitoring capabilities.
root_cause: Insufficient storage monitoring and capacity planning
vendor_actions_taken: Added storage, restored backup schedule, but delayed in identifying the issue initially
business_impact: High - potential data loss risk for 72-hour window
follow_up_actions: Vendor implemented daily backup verification reports
Daleel IT requested weekly status meetings

title: Application Server Crash
description: Primary application server crashed during business hours due to memory leak. Vendor took 6 hours to fully restore service.
root_cause: Undetected memory leak in application code introduced in recent update
vendor_actions_taken: Restarted server initially (temporary fix), took additional 4 hours to identify and patch memory leak
business_impact: Critical - complete service outage for 200+ users
follow_up_actions: Vendor committed to improved testing procedures

title: Security Patch Delay
description: Critical security patches not applied within required 48-hour SLA window.  Vendor cited resource constraints.
root_cause: Vendor staffing shortage during peak period
vendor_actions_taken: Eventually applied patches but missed SLA by 72 hours, cited hiring challenges
business_impact: Medium - increased vulnerability window, no actual breach
